title: You Don’t Need Your Husband’s Support to Lose Weight
itunes:title: You Don’t Need Your Husband’s Support to Lose Weight
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

Today we talk about the blame game. It's so easy to think if our husbands would quit keeping junk in the house, our boss wouldn't make us work late, or our kids ate better that we could "lose weight."

If you need the world to be perfect to lose weight then you have a problem.

This podcast is going to teach you how to go from blaming lack of weightloss on "the world" to knowing how to own your weightloss no matter what.
